title: Trying to Record a Replay Crash
body: About 3 days before patch 8.21 went live, I went to clip a play I made in one of my games, and I loaded into the spectating tool fine, but as soon as I went to click record, my client crashed and bug splat appeared. This is still happening as of yet, as I tried again 10 minutes ago to the same result. I know this might be related to the spectator glitch, but since I have seen no specific posts addressing it, I wanted to make sure it became known.
